quiz.Question: Which Go Version added Generics Support?
What are Constraints used for in generics?
Options: Only to be used with types specified
Only to be used with certain variable
Better to use with certain types
quiz.Answer: Only to be used with types specified

quiz.Question: What does type Inference do in go?
Options: Infers type from name of variables
Infers type by matching types of arguments
quiz.Answer: Infers type by matching types of arguments

quiz.Question: Can type inference fail at compile time?
